passive_skill.name: Ideal Combat Distance
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 170% up; Per "Androids" Category ally attacking in the same turn (self excluded): ATK & DEF 17% up; Per "Target: Goku" Category ally attacking in the same turn (self excluded): ATK & DEF 17% up; After receiving an attack: ATK 17% up and damage reduction rate 17% up for 3 turns after the end of the turn; For every attack received: (Forever) High chance of Ki +1 (up to +7)

passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 17% up; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +2 per Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained; Per "Androids", "Target: Goku" or "GT Bosses" Category ally attacking in the same turn (depending on which Category has more members): ATK & DEF 50% up; When there is another "Androids" or "Target: Goku" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (TEQ excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres; DEF 170% up; Damage reduction rate 17% up; For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack (up to 2 times); When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 17 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 70% up; Chance of performing a critical hit 17% up; When receiving an attack: DEF 100% up; Damage reduction rate 17% up; For every attack received: (Forever) Ki +1 (up to +7); (Forever) ATK, DEF & chance of performing a critical hit 10% up (up to 70%)
